summary: This is an email or internal communication from the Federal Correctional Institution (FCI) Estill regarding Jeffrey Epstein's status on August 1, 2019. It details his schedule, notes he was taken off psych ops, and reports a Suicide Risk Assessment (SRA) was conducted that day by a doctor, finding him psychologically stable. The SRA was initiated because Epstein returned from court with a note indicating suicidal tendencies.

persons.name: Jeffrey Edward Epstein
persons.context: The primary subject of the document; an inmate at FCI Estill (Reg. No. 76316-054). The communication details his schedule, removal from psych ops, and the results of a Suicide Risk Assessment conducted on August 1, 2019.

persons.name: Dr._
persons.context: Conducted the Suicide Risk Assessment (SRA) on Jeffrey Epstein on August 1, 2019. The findings indicated Epstein was psychologically stable.

persons.name: Dann
persons.context: Mentioned in the context of the Suicide Risk Assessment. The text 'Per Dann...' suggests he provided information or was involved in the reporting chain regarding the SRA.

connections.description: Dr. conducted a Suicide Risk Assessment on inmate Jeffrey Epstein on August 1, 2019.
Dann, as Associate Warden (Operations), is part of the prison staff responsible for Epstein's custody and reported on the SRA findings.

events.title: Epstein's Court Appearance
events.description: Jeffrey Epstein had a court appearance from 9:30 am to 11:30 am. He returned from court with a note indicating suicidal tendencies, which later prompted a Suicide Risk Assessment.

events.title: Epstein Taken Off Psych Ops
events.description: Jeffrey Epstein was taken off psych ops (psychological operations/observation).

events.title: Suicide Risk Assessment Conducted
events.description: A Suicide Risk Assessment (SRA) was conducted on Jeffrey Epstein by Dr. _. The findings indicated he was psychologically stable. The assessment was initiated because he returned from court the previous day with a note about suicidal tendencies.

events.title: Attorney Conference
events.description: Jeffrey Epstein had an attorney conference beginning at 9:00 am, ongoing at the time of the communication.

locations.name: FCI Estill
locations.context: Federal Correctional Institution where Jeffrey Epstein was held. The address is 100 Prison Road, Estill, SC 29918.

keyFacts: On August 1, 2019, a Suicide Risk Assessment (SRA) was conducted on Jeffrey Epstein by a doctor, who found him 'psychologically stable'.
The SRA was initiated because Epstein returned from a court appearance on July 31, 2019, with a note indicating suicidal tendencies.
Epstein had been taken off 'psych ops' (psychological observation) on July 30, 2019, the day before his court appearance.
The document is internal correspondence from FCI Estill staff, detailing Epstein's schedule and status shortly before his death.
